feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [CA/EU][Hosted Private Cloud] - SSL Gateway maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 9, 08:00 UTC  -  Dec 13, 17:00 UTC

Dec 3, 19:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 09/12/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 13/12/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, access to SSL Gateway will be unavailable for 5 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be doing a maintenance on the SSL Gateway.

entry.title: [RBX2a][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 5, 05:00 UTC  -  Dec 13, 13:00 UTC

Dec 2, 15:59 UTC
Scheduled - The maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This maintenance aims to enhance the security of your service.

Related incident : For more information about the recent incident that has been successfully resolved, please visit the following link: https://hosted-private-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/vzkjxh6xly92

We have contacted the affected customers to assist them in migrating to the available datastores.

Maintenance details:
Start time : 05/12/2024 05:00 UTC
End time : 13/12/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact: During the maintenance, you should not experience any service interruptions. However, there may be temporary latency on some virtual machines (VMs).

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Rack R831B14

entry.title: [RBX2a][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 25, 13:58 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 22/11/2024 15:42 UTC
End Time : 22/11/2024 19:35 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2a
Root cause : Incident due to cooling issue.

After our team's intervention, the recent incident has been successfully resolved, and all datastores are now functioning normally.
We have contacted the affected customers and encourage them to migrate to the datastores that have been made available to them.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Nov 22, 20:06 UTC
Monitoring - We would like to inform you that the incident has been resolved.
All services have been operational since 22/11/2024 19:35 UTC.
Our technical team is monitoring the incident over the weekend to ensure that the service is fully concluded.

Nov 22, 19:02 UTC
Update - Our teams are working to resolve this incident once and for all since 15:42 UTC.
The impacted servers have been reconnected. We are in the process of checking the condition of the services.
A significant number of services are operational again.

We will keep you informed when we will have additional detail or when the servers will be available again


We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Nov 22, 17:58 UTC
Update - Our technical team is mobilized and has been working on resolving the incident since 22/11/2024 15:42 UTC.
Hardware verification ongoing on impacted servers.
We will keep you informed when we will have additional detail or when the servers will be available again

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Nov 22, 17:02 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified as a cooling issue, and a fix is being implemented.
Our teams are fully mobilized, and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

This may temporarily affect availability.

End time : 20/11/2024 15:00 UTC

Thank you for your understanding.
